original_text: And he went in to Hagar, and she conceived. And when she saw that she had conceived, she looked with contempt on her mistress.
korean_text: 아브람이 하갈과 동침하였더니 하갈이 임신하매 그가 자기의 임신함을 알고 그의 여주인을 멸시한지라

sentences.original_text: And he went in to Hagar
And when she saw that she had conceived
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀가 자신이 잉태한 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: she looked with contempt on her mistress.
